TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Principal extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class Principal Implements IDisposable
public ref class Principal abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 封装对所有安全主体通用的帐户数据和操作。

span.span: Encapsulates the account data and operations common to all security principals.

summary.span: 这是从中派生所有安全主体的抽象基类。

span.span: This is the abstract base class from which all security principals are derived.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生类构造函数中调用此构造函数以初始化基类。Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [主体扩展](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb384372(v=vs.90)) 概述主题。For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb384372(v=vs.90)) overview topic.

summary.span: 此构造函数由派生类构造函数调用以初始化基类，不适合直接从代码中调用。

span.span: This constructor is called by derived-class constructors to initialize the base class and is not intended to be called directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从此类派生的自定义扩展类可以从派生类构造函数中调用此构造函数以初始化基类。Custom extension classes that derive from this class can call this constructor from the derived class constructor to initialize the base class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [主体扩展](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb384372(v=vs.90)) 概述主题。For more information, see the [Principal Extensions](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb384372(v=vs.90)) overview topic.

summary.span: 此方法由从此主体类派生的类调用。

span.span: This method is called by classes that derive from this principal class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检查对象是否已被释放，然后确定对象是否已被删除。This method checks whether the object has been disposed before it determines whether it has been deleted.

exception.span: 已对此主体对象调用 方法。

span.span: The method has been called on this principal object.

exception.span: 已对此主体对象调用 方法。

span.span: The method has been called on this principal object.

summary.span: 返回组对象的集合，这些对象指定当前主体是其成员的组。

span.span: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载方法仅返回主体是其直接成员的组;不执行递归搜索。This overloaded method only returns the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. 递归搜索结果适用于用户主体对象。Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 如果主体存储区是 AD DS 的，则组列表包含由 AD DS 对象中的 "主要组 ID" 属性标识的用户的主要组。If the principal store is AD DS, the list of groups contains the user's primary group that is identified by the primary group ID attribute in the AD DS object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups() cil managed
Public Function GetGroups () As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

summary.span: 返回组对象的集合，这些对象指定当前主体是其成员的组。

span.span: Returns a collection of group objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

returns.span: 对象的集合，这些对象指定当前主体是其成员的组。

span.span: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只返回主体为其直接成员的组;不执行递归搜索。This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. 递归搜索结果适用于用户主体对象。Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 此方法返回的组可以包含不同于主体的不同范围和存储区中的组。The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal. 例如，如果主体是一个具有 DN "CN = SpecialGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com" 的 AD DS 对象，则返回的集合可以包含属于 "CN = NormalGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com" 的组。For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com. 如果当前主体是 AD DS 主体，则返回的组包括主体主组，如 AD DS 对象上的 "primaryGroupId" 属性所示。If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group, as indicated by the "primaryGroupId" attribute on the AD DS object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> GetGroups(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext contextToQuery) cil managed
Public Function GetGroups (contextToQuery As PrincipalContext) As PrincipalSearchResult(Of Principal)

param.name: contextToQuery
param.span: 一个 对象，用于指定对其执行查询的上下文。

span.span: The object that specifies the context against which the query is performed.

param.span: 如果上下文位于另一个域中，则对主体对象在指定上下文中的表示形式执行查询。

span.span: When the context is located in another domain, the query is performed against the principal objects' representation in the specified context.

summary.span: 返回组对象的集合，主体是这些对象的成员，并且这些对象存在于由指定的上下文参数提供的存储区中。

span.span: Returns a collection of group objects that the principal is a member of and that exist in the store provided by the specified context parameter.

returns.span: 对象的集合，这些对象指定当前主体是其成员的组。

span.span: A collection of objects that specify the groups of which the current principal is a member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法只返回主体为其直接成员的组;不执行递归搜索。This method returns only the groups of which the principal is directly a member; no recursive searches are performed. 递归搜索结果适用于用户主体对象。Recursive search results are available for user principal objects. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 此方法返回的组可以包含不同于主体的不同范围和存储区中的组。The groups that are returned by this method may include groups from a different scope and store than the principal. 例如，如果主体是一个具有 DN "CN = SpecialGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com" 的 AD DS 对象，则返回的集合可以包含属于 "CN = NormalGroups，DC = Fabrikam，DC = com" 的组。For example, if the principal is an AD DS object that has a DN of "CN=SpecialGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com, the returned set can contain groups that belong to the "CN=NormalGroups,DC=Fabrikam,DC=com. 如果当前主体是 AD DS 主体，则返回的组包括主体主组，如 AD DS 对象上的主要组 ID 属性所示。If the current principal is an AD DS principal, the returned groups include the principals primary group as indicated by the primary group ID attribute on the AD DS object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext context) cil managed

param.name: context
param.span: ，用于指定要对其执行操作的服务器或域。

span.span: The that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.

summary.span: 将对主体对象所做的更改保存到存储区中。

span.span: Saves the changes that were made on the principal object to the store.

summary.span: 如果它是一个新主体对象，则此方法会将其插入到指定上下文中。

span.span: If this is a new principal object, this method inserts it into the specified context.

summary.span: 如果已保持主体，则会将该主体从原来的上下文移动到指定的上下文中。

span.span: If the principal has already been persisted, it is moved from the original context to the specified context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的主体上下文与现有上下文不同，则主体将移动到指定的上下文，并且主体对象将不再位于旧位置。If the specified principal context differs from the existing context, the principal is moved to the specified context, and the principal object no longer is located in the old location. 如果指定的上下文与现有上下文完全相同，则此方法会将对主体对象所做的更新保存到存储区。If the specified context is identical to the existing context, this method saves the updates that were made on the principal object to the store. 指定上下文的上下文类型必须与当前上下文类型的类型相同。The context type of the specified context must be the same type as the current context type. 不能使用计算机上下文类型调用此方法。This method may not be called by using the computer context type.

exception.span: 主体尚未与 对象关联。

span.span: The principal has not yet been associated with a object.

exception.span: 无法将此类型的主体插入到存储区中。

span.span: This type of principal cannot be inserted in the store.

exception.span: 将更改保存到存储区或更新存储区中的组成员资格时发生异常。

span.span: An exception occurred when saving changes to the store, or updating the group membership in the store.

exception.span: 存储区中已经存在该主体。

span.span: The principal already occurs in the store.

exception.span: 密码不满足复杂度要求。

span.span: The password does not meet complexity requirements.
